dialogue.introduction: I'm... Hatsuyuki. What? I'll do... starting tomorrow.
dialogue.library_intro: Special-type destroyer... 3rd ship... Hatsuyuki. At the start of the war... I participated a lot. Transport duties... yes... I'll work hard...
dialogue.secretaryidle: Firstly, a comfortable futon. Next would be food and drinks. Then books and games and things like that... Well, it'd be nice...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Fine with me, I don't really... Hatsuyuki doesn't really like combat. Being together is fine... right? It's okay, nothing really...
dialogue.wedding: Umm.. I…. l-like… I mean… erm… um…. never mind...
dialogue.show_players_score: Ah... you want to see? ...Information? ...Without me looking, or something... Ah, understood... I'll show you it.
dialogue.equipment2: Yeah, with this... I can do better.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Gonna hide in my room... for a bit.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: It hurts. Wanna get repaired. Gonna go hide.
dialogue.docking_complete: A ship is fully healed... isn't it better not bother to come back?...
dialogue.ship_construction: New friend... is here... I wonder who.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Oh, if I'm really allowed to do this...! Destroyer Hatsuyuki, launching...!
dialogue.night_battle: I'm actually good at this... really!
dialogue.night_attack: When I get serious, I can do anything...!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: When I get serious, I can do anything...!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: When I get serious, I can do anything...!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: When I get serious, I can do anything...!
dialogue.mvp: I'll get serious starting tomorrow...! Watch...!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I can't take it, wanna go home...
dialogue.sunk: I already had a bad feeling about this... I'm done...
dialogue.christmas_2014: Ku-ri-su-ma-su...? What's that...? Is it delicious...? ... Ah! Please give Hatsuyuki a piece of cake too!
dialogue.new_year_2015: Happy New Year... regards... Where is my new years money...? Eh? ...There is none...
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: W-well, I did buy some ch-cho....chocolate....for you....
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: I don't get what's going on since I was sleeping... It's an anniversary today right? Not... bad.
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: Rain of Tsuyu season... I hate rain. Gonna go hide.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Cleaning this year is tiring as well. But after that it's time for Annual Kanmusu Festival! What am I going to sing this year. I'm pretty good at this, like. A~ e~ i~ u~ e~ o~ a~ o~.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Commander, Happy New Yea... *coughs*. Happy New Year. I finally managed to say it this year!
